title: (x) I, Robot movie credits - Infinity {Alex Tamas}
content: I think this must have been a slightly modified Infinity, though because the "O"s in the credits were round and the O's in Infinity are squared.
author: James Gareth

comments.content: Everytime I use Infinty I must custom something... Specially the "t"... just can't look at that glyph.
